title: Military AI British Male Voice Announcer
description: 1268 files of +1250 unique phrases of an AI British Male Announcer for RTS, MOBA, FPS, Sci-fi, Apocalyptic games etc. Includes 3 Ver: Original, Echo and Robotic (3804 files).
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Audio Preview : Original | Echo | Robotic ||| List of Phrases


This pack is part of our Military AI Announcer Bundle , Ultimate Announcers Bundle & Ultimate Military Bundle!


This AI British Male Announcer voice pack, recorded by a real human voice actor, covers everything you need for your next project.

It includes 3 versions: Original, Echo and Robotic (3804 files TOTAL!), so you can use them as they are or apply any effect you desire to the original files.

The pack can be used for games such as: RTS, MOBA, FPS, Sci-fi, Apocalyptic games and more.

It can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 1268 files (3804 with effects) of +1250 unique phrases.
  • Includes 3 versions: Original, Echo and Robotic.
  • Sounds were recorded by a real human voice actor.
  • Native British/English accent.
  • The pack is divided by categories for easy access.
  • Top quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.
